query:
CREATE TABLE `anomaly_alert_logs` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY,
  `ruleId` int NOT NULL,
  `userId` int NOT NULL,
  `accountId` int,
  `anomalyType` enum('bid_spike','bid_drop','batch_size','budget_change','acos_spike','spend_velocity','click_anomaly','conversion_drop') NOT NULL,
  `detectedValue` decimal(10,2) NOT NULL,
  `thresholdValue` decimal(10,2) NOT NULL,
  `deviationPercent` decimal(5,2),
  `affectedTargetType` varchar(50),
  `affectedTargetId` int,
  `affectedTargetName` varchar(500),
  `operationLogId` int,
  `actionTaken` enum('none','alerted','paused','rolled_back','blocked') DEFAULT 'alerted' NOT NULL,
  `notificationSent` tinyint DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  `notificationSentAt` timestamp,
  `acknowledged` tinyint DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  `acknowledgedBy` int,
  `acknowledgedAt` timestamp,
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
);
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user GdNjKxkKZgeVtwE.root --database 5MUJ5aHkiAehb9iTzNdxTq --execute CREATE TABLE `anomaly_alert_logs` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY,
  `ruleId` int NOT NULL,
  `userId` int NOT NULL,
  `accountId` int,
  `anomalyType` enum('bid_spike','bid_drop','batch_size','budget_change','acos_spike','spend_velocity','click_anomaly','conversion_drop') NOT NULL,
  `detectedValue` decimal(10,2) NOT NULL,
  `thresholdValue` decimal(10,2) NOT NULL,
  `deviationPercent` decimal(5,2),
  `affectedTargetType` varchar(50),
  `affectedTargetId` int,
  `affectedTargetName` varchar(500),
  `operationLogId` int,
  `actionTaken` enum('none','alerted','paused','rolled_back','blocked') DEFAULT 'alerted' NOT NULL,
  `notificationSent` tinyint DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  `notificationSentAt` timestamp,
  `acknowledged` tinyint DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  `acknowledgedBy` int,
  `acknowledgedAt` timestamp,
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
);
